mapper.insert: insert into IPO_RELEASESUBSCRIPTION (ID, FIRMID, COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME, ISSUEPRICE, PURCHASETIME, PURCHASEQUANTITY, PURCHASEAMOUNT, ISSUANCEFEE, REFUNDABLEPURCHASEAMOUNT, REFUNDABLESERVICEFEE, CREATETIME) values (SEQ_IPO_RELEASESUBSCRIPTION.NEXTVAL, #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchasetime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{purchasequantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchaseamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{issuancefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{refundablepurchaseamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{refundableservicefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update IPO_RELEASESUBSCRIPTION set FIRMID = #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITYID = #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITYNAME = #{commodityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUEPRICE = #{issueprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PURCHASETIME = #{purchasetime,jdbcType=DATE}, PURCHASEQUANTITY = #{purchasequantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PURCHASEAMOUNT = #{purchaseamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ISSUANCEFEE = #{issuancefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REFUNDABLEPURCHASEAMOUNT = #{refundablepurchaseamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REFUNDABLESERVICEFEE = #{refundableservicefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, FIRMID, COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME, ISSUEPRICE, PURCHASETIME, PURCHASEQUANTITY, PURCHASEAMOUNT, ISSUANCEFEE, REFUNDABLEPURCHASEAMOUNT, REFUNDABLESERVICEFEE, CREATETIME from IPO_RELEASESUBSCRIPTION where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select ID, FIRMID, COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME, ISSUEPRICE, PURCHASETIME, PURCHASEQUANTITY, PURCHASEAMOUNT, ISSUANCEFEE, REFUNDABLEPURCHASEAMOUNT, REFUNDABLESERVICEFEE, CREATETIME from IPO_RELEASESUBSCRIPTION
